<rule id="cdi-to-quarkus-00030" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile as="root" in="beans.xml" matches="/b:beans">
                    <namespace prefix="b" uri="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"/>
                </xmlfile>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <iteration over="root">
                    <hint category-id="potential" effort="3" title="`beans.xml` descriptor content is ignored">
                        <message>
                            `beans.xml` descriptor content is ignored and it could be removed from the application.  
                            Refer to the guide referenced below to check the supported CDI feature in Quarkus.
                        </message>
                        <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/cdi-reference#limitations" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                    </hint>
                </iteration>
            </perform>
        </rule>
